TITLE: Extradition of 'El Chapo' son to the US halted after 29 killed in arrest operation
SUMMARY: A Mexico City federal judge halted the extradition of Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzmán's son, alleged drug cartel leader Ovidio Guzmán, to the United States on Friday, a day after he was arrested in an intense operation in northern Mexico that led to the deaths of 29 people.
